channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Strategy’s stock shows why it’s a trade, and not an investment
item.description: Strategy’s stock is sinking as bitcoin falls, but Wall Street doesn’t believe it’s a big problem for the broader stock market.

item.title: Gold, silver and copper are reaching record highs together for the first time in 45 years. Here’s why more gains could follow.
item.description: Some factors driving metals prices higher in 2025 are similar to those back in 1980, strategists say. But a few important differences could offer clue...

item.title: ‘The card served its purpose’: It’s time to cancel our Chase Disney Visa credit card. What’s our next card for middle age?
item.description: “We’d like to move on to another credit card for the benefits.”

item.title: Gold at $10,000, a quantum-driven crypto collapse and costly AI scandals are among these ‘outrageous’ bets for 2026.
item.description: Saxo Bank is at it again with outrageous predictions for 2026.

item.title: My friend cosigned a loan for a BMW, but the driver defaulted. They’re both on the hook for $5K. What happens now?
item.description: “The driver thinks he should be compensated $1,500 for the tires he’s still paying for.”

item.title: Bank of America hikes Eli Lilly price target on promising drug pipeline
item.description: Bank of America's new price target has shares of Eli Lilly climbing 22% from here.

item.title: NYSE insider Jay Woods on the stocks to watch this week, including a retail turnaround story
item.description: Jay Woods gives Pro subscribers the rundown on the week ahead from the NYSE.

item.title: Holiday shopping season kicks off with a solid start. Here are the big winners
item.description: Omnichannel retailers and a couple of beauty names look to be the biggest beneficiaries of Black Friday spending this year, according to analysts.

item.title: This stock tied to U.S. housing could be in trouble. How to make money on potential declines through options
item.description: Michael Khouw explains why selling calls on this name makes sense.

item.title: New Fortress Energy: From Distress to Dominance – The Turnaround Thesis in LNG Infrastructure
item.description: New Fortress Energy Inc. (NASDAQ: NFE), a pioneer in integrated gas-to-power infrastructure, has endured a brutal year. Shares have plummeted over 90%...

item.title: Josh Brown bought this tech stock when he was a retail broker decades ago. Now it's back on his radar
item.description: Josh and Sean revisit their Morgan Stanley play and also give two new names on the Best Stocks list.

item.title: SUPX Surges 11% on $20M Buyback News

item.title: Chaince Digital Surges 23% on $200M AI Factory Deal

item.title: Fed Governor Spooks Wall Street: SPY Drops $21 in 2 Hours After Valuation Warning
